Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from S protein of FCoV)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24312629]feline coronavirus(FCoV):inhibition of virus replication in Fcwf-4 cells(IC50=1.8 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide can interfere the fusion of the viral envelope with host membrane and thus inhibits viral replication.

Literature.Title: Peptides corresponding to the predicted heptad repeat 2 domain of the feline coronavirus spike protein are potent inhibitors of viral infection.
Literature.Author: Liu IJ, Tsai WT, Hsieh LE, Chueh LL.
